label: Product
comment: Any tangible output or service produced by human or mechanical effort or by a natural process.

datatypeProperties.comment: An identifier assigned to indicate conformity with a regulation or standard for this trade product, such as "CE" which declares that the product conforms with the essential requirements of the applicable EC directives.

objectProperties.comment: A Material Safety Data Sheet (MSDS) document referenced for this product.
A referenced inspection document for this trade product.
A certification applicable to this trade product.
A referenced marketing campaign document for this trade product.
The party that owns the brand of this trade product.
A transport information note for this trade product.
A final assembly country for this trade product.
A product classification designated for this trade product.

referencedBy.comment: A product applicable for this subordinate trade line item.
